page.title: 11SMALL HOLDING BROOK FARM
page.content: MERCASTON LANE, MERCASTON. Mr & Mrs Sims have lived here since 1968. There are about 8 acres. One field for hay to feed the cattle.Have a suckling cow among others & 6 hens. There is mains gas which is unusual. Electricity, mains water, & septic tank. Post box is close by. Deep freezer is essential, & wine is made from natural products in the fields & hedges. Very conscious of keeping check on neighbours that they are alright, especially in winter. The property is part of the Kingsgrove Estate. Very self-sufficient people - in the process of painting the out- side of the house. Very attractive garden with some mature trees.
